name: peace beanie
sizes_available: newborn, baby, toddler, child, small adult, large adult
notes:
the peace beanie is a simple yet stylish chunky knit beanie pattern that’s perfect for adventurous beginners. this fast knit features a combination of five rounds of garter stitch and three rounds of k1p1 ribbing, giving it a modern, textured look. whether you’re knitting for a newborn or an adult, this pattern has sizing options for everyone, making it an ideal gift or quick project for yourself.

knit in the round using [premier yarns anti-pilling bamboo chunky][1], the hat is warm yet lightweight, and the anti-pilling feature ensures it stays looking fresh and soft after multiple wears. i used an italian cast on for extra stretch, but any stretchy cast on will work. while i kept mine pompom-free, feel free to add a yarn or faux fur pompom to make it your own!

skills needed:

knitting in the round
basic stitches (knit, purl)
italian cast on (optional, any stretchy cast on will work)
pattern notes:

this beanie knits up quickly and is perfect for a last-minute project or gift.
ideal for beginners who want to try working in the round and experiment with simple textures.
optional: add a yarn or faux fur pompom for a fun, personalized touch!


pattern link: [visit the blog for free pattern][2]
